## UCLA – Statistics & Data Science

### Core Statistics / Data Science

- **Stats 102B – Intro to Computation & Optimization for Statistics**  
  R programming, optimization algorithms, regression with regularization.

- **Stats 102C – Regression & Statistical Learning**  
  Linear/logistic regression, glmnet, cross-validation, model selection.

- **Stats 140XP – Design & Analysis of Experiments**  
  ANOVA, mixed designs, randomized experiments, R + report writing.

### Other Quantitative / Applied Courses

- **Psychology / Sociology research courses**  
  Data collection, survey design, basic modeling, report writing.
